locations.rawText:

1525 Indian Trail Road, Norcross, Georgia 30093

notes: Norcross, Georgia. Based on eight different widely recognized martial art styles: Tae Kwon Do, Wing Chun, Shoalin Wu Shu, Jujitsu/Judo, Muay Thai, Capoeira, Nin-Po, Pressure Points. name: Capoeira Angola

locations.name: Pahoa community center
locations.rawText:
we meet every Sat at  8am  at the Pahoa community center.
right now we're up on the baseball field above the center. we do angola,
no shoes, on concrete, rain or shine. everyone welcome. bless.

notes: Hawaii County. We meet every Sat at 8am at the Pahoa community center. Right now we're up on the baseball field above the center. We do angola, no shoes, on concrete, rain or shine. Everyone welcome. We are Rasta and have no problem with different types of people. SOURCE: capoeira.com PM from ifajah 10/24/06
rawRecord:
Capoeira Angola
(we meet every Sat at  8am  at the Pahoa community center.
right now we're up on the baseball field above the center. we do angola,
no shoes, on concrete, rain or shine. everyone welcome. bless.)
( If you ever come to the islands, go to Ras Randy's class.
8am every Sat in Pahoa, rain or shine. We play on concrete with no shoes.
If you can hang and play in these elements, feel free to join us. We are
Rasta and have no problem with different types of people.)
SOURCE: capoeira.com PM from ifajah  10/24/06
